Title: Next to Me
Writer: Minja Bogavac, Minja Bogavac (screenplay), Stevan Filipovic (screenplay), Stevan Filipovic
Actors: Hristina Popovic, Slaven Doslo, Nikola Glisic, Milica Majkic
Plot: Olja is a high school history teacher, married to a painter whose latest exhibition provoked violent reactions from Serbian nationalists. One night, a group of masked hooligans attacks her....
